scenario_text.value: It appears this is the end of the line.
Look, over there! It’s Miyuki!
What?! Miyuki!!!
Calm down! Look who’s here...

...Children of sacrifice.
Here you shall meet your demise!
Miyuki... Sister!

You must be in there somewhere!
You must be able to hear me!

Miyuki! Can you hear my voice, too?
We all came to save you, together!

A useless effort...
The girl is mine!
Your prattle shall never reach her...!

You’re wrong! I know she’s in there!
Miyuki can hear us, I know she can!

Renamon’s right! Please, sis, we need you...!
Let’s go back home, together!
Miyuki...?

Still...she resists...
Damn you, maid of Minase...!
...haru...Akiharu...I...
Miyuki!
Sister!

(It’s her... No doubt about it, that’s Miyuki
herself!)

I won’t... I won’t let you!
You...belong to me!
Stop!
No... NOOOOOOOOO!!!

Look there! His followers are surrounding
Miyuki and...fusing together?!
Miyukiii!!!

I shall NEVER let her go...!
My ambition shall be realized!!!
I...shall BUTCHER YOU ALL!!!
